title: Pixel 5 Quick Charge (Charging Rapidly) with Google Pixel Stand
content:
Hi, quick question please.

I have a Pixel 5 and the official Google Stand.

When I sit my P5 on the stand it states "Charging wirelessly", I'm pretty sure it used to state Charging Rapidly. 

If I unplug the cable from the Stand and plug it directly into my P5, it states "Charging rapidly"

Has something changed that I'm missing ?

I'm pretty disappointed  if the Pixel Stand does not do some sort of quick charge (anymore) !

I have always had the settings for Adaptive Battery and Adaptive Charging set to on.

Thanks
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel Stand
